name: Word Search (Deep Mevada)
description:
Word Search is a word game in which the letters of words are arranged in a grid. The goal of this problem is to locate and label all of the hidden words inside the box. There are 3 ways to find the words: vertically, horizontally, or diagonally.
To search for a provided word, swipe upward, downward, left, right, or diagonally.

Word Search is completely FREE to play, now enjoy an unlimited number of word puzzles and hours of brain teasers!
